Title: Eyes of Laura Mars
Writer: John Carpenter (screenplay), David Zelag Goodman (screenplay), John Carpenter (story)
Actors: Faye Dunaway, Tommy Lee Jones, Brad Dourif, Rene Auberjonois
Plot: Suddenly Laura Mars can see through the eyes of a serial killer as he commits his crimes. She contacts the police and with the aid of a police detective, tries to stop the killer. But first, they have to figure out who it is.
